snippet.title: 《亞路塔 Aeruta》遊戲宣傳影片 | First Official Trailer 🍞
snippet.description:
🥨 Wishlist on Steam 🥨
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2286780/_/

🥐 FaceBook 🥐
https://www.facebook.com/fromdawn0024

🍞 Twitter 🍞 
https://twitter.com/FromDawnGames
-
一場席捲全世界的麵包革命現在開始！
主人公查雅陰錯陽差之下，開始了在荒廢的島嶼上經營麵包店的生活。 
出外冒險蒐集食材、研發嶄新麵包配方、遇見性格各異的夥伴們，建造更豐富的設施，用麵包香氣使無人問津的廣場再次熱鬧起來！
-
A bread revolution across the world now begins!
The main character, Chaya, accidentally begins a life of running a bakery on an abandoned island.
Go on adventures to collect materials, develop new bread recipes, encounter different friends with various personalities, build more buildings, and use the smell of bread to make the deserted plaza popular again!

#Aeruta #gaming #steam #switch
